item.description: Yay! It's another one of my Last-Minute Meetups! This week has flown by, and I haven't climbed since Sunday. I can't wait for tomorrow, so I'm going today. I'll be hitting Metro Rock by 7pm at the latest. I might be at the table, but more likely I'll be climbing already. See you there? Let's climb! Please note, you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You should also take a class at Metrorock if you have never climbed before. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements. Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. For more information see: http://www.metrorock.com The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in a grey shirt that reads "Making Democracy Happpen!"[sic] on back
item.name: WTF it's Thursday already?!!
